reviews.title: Bad Experience
reviews.text: For starters, do not get misled by "Suites", because the rooms are not suites. They say limited suites and I've stayed in regular rooms with more space and better amenities. You can get much better places to stay in nearby areas for the same price. Rooms are not clean, service is poor, staff is unfriendly and breakfast is below par. We booked a non-smoking room, but had to change to a smoking room due to the unbearable stench. The restroom was small and congested, and was not clean. Definitely not the place you'd want to stay on a vacation.

We stayed here on our drive up to Tenessee with our children. We arrived at almost midnight and were really tierd, didn't expect much just a place to lie down and shower. I was actually impressed for the price, it had 2 double beds and a pull out couch. The room was very clean, smelled fine, a/c worked great, showers were clean. I am surprised at what the other reviews say, maybe they changed management, but we were very happy with our short stay. Would stay there again if passing through the area.
reviews.title: Surprised at the other reviews
Horrid
reviews.text: This was the worst hotel experience I have ever had. The management was horrible--not at all friendly, helpful, or understanding. When we were there, there was a 10 minute policy about accepting the room. Maybe I am just not an experienced traveller, but I have never heard of a place where you have 10 minutes from check-in to say whether you want to keep the room. We barely got into the room before the front desk called to see if we wanted to stay. Stupid us said yes, before actually looking at the room. It ended up being horrible, and we decided to leave, but they said our 10 minutes were up. We ended up leaving without our money, but after about 30 minutes of arguing, they ended up giving us a voucher for the next time. Why would I want a voucher for a terrible hotel? But atleast we walked away with something.

reviews.title: Don't even think of staying here!
filfy
reviews.text: Non smoking room reeked of smoke, doors were warped and wouldn't close right, bathroom was moldy, and carpets felt like they had't been cleaned for months, and front desk help had tough time with basic english.

While not exactly dirty, it was not spit and polish clean. It was nice for what we needed, just a place to rest at night after a busy day. The "breakfast" left a little to be desired, being little more than a bag of mini-bagels, a half empty box of store bought doughnuts, cereal and milk. It was like having left-overs at home. If you are looking for a comfortable place to keep your stuff and rest, it's a nice place. Nothing fancy, but it gets the job done.
reviews.title: It's a Hotel alright, but not much more

reviews.text: This hotel is terrible! We stayed here while family member was in hospital. The Manager and staff are absolutly no help at all. There was dirty wash clothes hanging in shower, Mold in shower, and fights in parking lot which resulted in a car windsheild being broke and no hot water. This place is terrible
reviews.title: DO NOT STAY HERE

reviews.text: This place is decent, clean... value for money! And staff is very polite and room service is good! A nice place to stay if you dont want to spend a lot and still want something better than cheap motels!
reviews.title: Good place to stay! Good value for money

reviews.text: This Hotel was horrible. It was filthy looked as if it had not been cleaned in years. Site says small kitchenett in room THERE WAS A FULL SIZE STOVE (Who does that)? I didn't even want to take my shoes off the carpet was so nasty lookin. When we complained and said we decided not to take the room management was very nasty and would not refund money. We even tried to go through travelocity where we booked to get them to help us get refund which was unsuccesssful. Pictures on site shows decent looking hotel. Trust me it is not!!!!!!!!
reviews.title: Flea bag!!!!!!!! Do not stay!!!!!!!!!!

reviews.text: The room was ok save for the fact that it looked like it hadn't been updated in 10 or more years. however, management there leaves much to be desired. A majority of the staff spoke very little English. Four days into our 6 day stay we recieved a call about the death of a young member of our family (we live in Rochester, NY). We went down and let the clerk know that we had to leave early the next day in order to make it home in time to attend the funeral. Expedia (whom we booked our reservation with) was prepared to refund us our 2 last nights stay, however management of the hotel flat out refused to give us a refund, even after being given full details of the circumstances. i am confident that any other hotel would have understood and refunded us immediately, but we didn't even get a "sorry for your loss" from anyone there. It is sad to know how tight-fisted some people are nowadays especially when they are family owned establishments as this one seems to be.
reviews.title: Very Disappointed with Management

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We stayed at this hotel, along with 10 other hotels, during April 2012 as part of a 17 day road trip across GA, NC, SC. By giving the star rating I am not saying the hotel is a 2 star but whether it was clean and value for the money and to an extent we have compared then to the other 10 hotels we stayed at.
reviews.title: Could be a good budget choice

reviews.text: The main problem with the Ramada was that it was jaded and a bit on the dirty side right from the first impressions of the broken Ramada sign outside the place. Although the towels and the sheets looked clean there did not seem a lot of effort put into actually cleaning the room. There was a TV, fridge and microwave. There was an annoying hum from the fridge which was quite noticible at 3 in the morning.
reviews.title: Give it a chance

reviews.text: Being a motel you could park, free, right outside your door and there was only 2 floor so most people could manage the upper floor even with luggage quite easily. There was some loud music from the car park late evening but not a lot to worry about but I would advise quite strongly against opening the door at night to strangers.
reviews.title: No service and not very clean.

reviews.text: The included breakfast was a simple affair with not a lot of choice but enough for coffee, toast, cereal, cake and a poor imitation of OJ.
reviews.title: HAM - Hot A$$ Mess

reviews.text: At about £27 per night it was just acceptable but I would rather have paid a bit more for somewhere a bit better and would not stay there again. It is a pity that the owners don't just tidy the place up a bit and it would be a great deal.
reviews.title: The most horrifying and unsafe travel experience of my life.
